name: Brain Shave
overview: Considered a hidden gem of Amiga games, this was released on ASI-GAMES-VOL 144 and was created by Andrew Campbell. It has two variations of game: Gravity and Sliders. Brain Shave is the sequel to Enigma a PD game available on the Funhouse disk and on the Assassin's collection, in this new game. It is a game like White Rabbit or Enigma where the object of the game is to match up all the colored tiles by dragging them around the screen using a joystick controlled cursor. Select, press and hold fire and drag the file if it is free to move.
